p: This work presents the damage, host specificity, population dynamics, and the field occurrence of natural enemies of Lepidoptera species associated with M. calvescens in Brazil; the defoliators S. lotanalis, D. inscita, and A. leucocyma, three Limacodidae species, the fruit borer Carposina cardinata Meyrick (Carposinidae) and the flower damaging Pleuroprucha rudimentaria Guenée (Geometridae). The mass—rearing techniques of these species are also described.
